list_definition.definition: the power to affect people, actions or events

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He used his influence to get her the job
He should not have driven the car while under the influence of alcohol.

list_definition.definition: a person or thing that has this power

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She is a bad influence on him.
The weather seems to influence her moods.
